tutorials.description: Private Download - This is the BEST feature provided by the app, it enables you to download your DRAFT VIDEOS FROM TIKTOK.

Record Video -
  - Click on  'Record' and enable recording
  - Open 'TikTok' app play your drafted video in FULL VOLUME and in a silent place
  - Keep the video playing for thrice the time to the original
  - Close the preview video screen or the tiktok app and finally you have your DRAFTED TIKTOK VIDEO SAVED !!
Edit Video - From 'Private Videos' screen you can edit videos and trim/crop it to the original video length, this will save your draft video to gallery.\n  ENJOY AND SHARE APP WITH OTHERS.
